headline: Blackstone Private Credit Fund Starts to Win Over Europe’s Rich
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Blackstone Inc.’s European private credit fund for high net-worth individuals, ECRED, is set to reach €1.5 billion ($1.53 billion) by month’s end, a threefold surge over the past year.
